DIF.Entry_Title: Methyl Chloride Measurements in the Taylor Dome M3C1 Ice Core

Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Title: Methyl Chloride Measurements in the Taylor Dome M3C1 Ice Core
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Publisher: NSIDC: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Reference.Author: Verhulst, K. R., M. Aydin, and E. Saltzman
Reference.Title: Methyl chloride variability in the Taylor Dome ice core during the Holocene

Project.Long_Name: Division of Polar Programs, Antarctic Research, Glaciology

Contact_Address.Address: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Summary.Abstract: This data set includes methyl chloride (CH<sub>3</sub>CI) measurements made on air extracted from 62 samples from the Taylor Dome M3C1 ice core in East Antarctica. CH<sub>3</sub>CI was measured in air from the Taylor Dome ice core to reconstruct an atmospheric record for the Holocene (11-0 kyr B.P.) and part of the last glacial period (50-30 kyr B.P.).
